comments.content: It appears to be [Plantin Bold Italic](http://web.archive.org/web/20141025190152/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/adobe/plantin/bold-italic/) with little swashes added to a few letters.

Looks like you're exactly right! Thanks so much!  
The swashes look like they were borrowed from the lowercase w or v -- if anyone cares. ;-)  
It's been a long time since I've really looked at Plantin... it looks great!
